name: The Blizzard 30-Year Celebration Collection
description:
To play this game on PS5, your system may need to be updated to the latest system software. Although this game is playable on PS5, some features available on PS4 may be absent. See PlayStation.com/bc for more details.
In celebration of Blizzard Entertainment's 30th anniversary, this limited-time bundle includes three classic Blizzard console games and a cache of commemorative in-game content for Overwatch and Diablo III.

BLIZZARD® ARCADE COLLECTION
Relax and rewind with the Blizzard Arcade Collection, featuring faithful reproductions of Blackthorne, The Lost Vikings, and Rock N Roll Racing for modern platforms*. This collection contains two different Original Editions of each game as well as a new Definitive Edition—bringing you the gameplay you remember plus a variety of new features, quality of life improvements, and behind-the-scenes content.

OVERWATCH® IN-GAME ITEMS
StarCraft®'s rebellious marshal, Jim Raynor, is touching down in Overwatch as the Raynhardt Legendary skin for Reinhardt, bringing with him a supply drop of Classic Loot Boxes, Golden Loot Boxes (which include a guaranteed Legendary), along with a commemorative 30th anniversary icon and spray**.

DIABLO® III IN-GAME ITEMS
Diablo’s Dark Wanderer again seeks the east. Adopt the guise of Tristram’s fallen warrior in Diablo III with a terrifyingly familiar transmog set, wings, pet, and portrait***. (Diablo III is rated MATURE 17+ by the ESRB.)

*Includes PlayStation®4 versions but can also be played on PlayStation®5 via backwards capability.
**Requires Overwatch.
***Requires Diablo III.


Offline multiplayer (2-4 players)
Remote Play allows users to connect to and play games on their PlayStation®4 or PlayStation®5 using a mobile device, PC, or another PlayStation®4 or PlayStation®5.


Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy).

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense).

One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.
